## [Accessing open book data with openlibraryR](https://www.kaylinpavlik.com/openlibraryr/)

By [Kaylin Pavlik](https://www.kaylinpavlik.com/openlibraryr/)

Added Thu Apr 22, 2021

**What is this?**

**Excerpt from the site:** openlibraryR is a simple API wrapper for OpenLibrary.org, which aims to have a web page for every book ever published.
Users can add to the catalogue, download or borrow books, or edit one of the 20 million+ current records.

1.  Site is here: <https://www.kaylinpavlik.com/openlibraryr/>
